sourcesContent:
<template>
  <transition name="modal-animation">
    <section v-show="modalActive" class="modal">
      <transition name="modal-animation-inner">
        <section v-show="modalActive" class="modal-inner">
          <slot />
          <button>Close</button>
        </section>
      </transition>
    </section>
  </transition>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    props: ["modalActive"],
  };
</script>
